Gabriel Ellison (1930 ruo 18 Julaị 2017) bụ Omenkà Zambia, nke a maara nke ọma maka inye aka n'ịmepụta ọkọlọtọ mba Zambia, na maka imepụta ọtụtụ stampụ Zambia site na 1960s ruo 1980s mgbe ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba Graphic Arts na Ministry of Information.
A mụrụ Gabriel Ellison na Lusaka, Zambia (nke bụbu Northern Rhodesia)
Ọrụ mmepụta ya gụnyere mmanụ, acrylics, mmiri, tempera na ụdị atọ
Mgbe ọ na-emepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọ na-eji ọla nchara resin na terracotta.
Ellison bụ onye otu Royal Society of Arts, British Display Society na Chartered Society of designers
Gọọmentị Britain na Zambia kwanyeere ya ugwu maka ọrụ ya na nka
Gọọmentị Britain nyere ya MBE na Gọọmentụ Zambia nyere ya Grand Officer of Distinguished Service.
Ellison nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ Iri asatọ na asaa, na 18 Julaị 2017.
